Articles.Content:
I'm on KSP 1.11.2 (Since mods stopped my game from loading in 1.12) and I have a bunch of the near future mods (specifically near future spacecraft, propulsion, electrical, and solar). I think I have all of the required other mods to keep those running, but they just aren't showing up in-game. Any reasons/fixes for this? 


To add on, I think the near future stuff is on the latest version (not 1.11.2), but is there any way to find older versions on the Near Future mods that are compatible w/ 1.11.2?

Another edit, I found a mod on Curseforge in version 1.11.2 called "KNES-1" and downloaded that. It doesn't work for some reason.

Edited July 25, 2021 by Ant47
